description: This trail is mainly for hiking and includes a steep incline up the niagara escarpment.  It is part of the Bruce Trail system.
directions: Traveling northbound on Brant street in Burlington, turn left onto Upper Middle road, continue till the road ends in a T intersection, turn right and take the road to the end of the cul-de-sac, park on the street the trailhead begins straight off the end of the street and travels to the left.
title: Kerncliff
